first_para: Paul Christopher Maynard (born 16 December 1975) is a British Conservative Party politician. He was elected at the 2010 general election as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Blackpool North and Cleveleys.

full.extract:
Paul Christopher Maynard (born 16 December 1975) is a British Conservative Party politician. He was elected at the 2010 general election as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Blackpool North and Cleveleys.
^ "Paul Maynard MP". Democracy Live (BBC News). Retrieved 25 July 2010. 
^ http://www.ukwhoswho.com/view/article/oupww/whoswho/U251252/
^ "List of Members returned to serve in Parliament at the General Election 2010". London Gazette. 13 May 2010. Retrieved 20 May 2010.
full.title: Paul Maynard
